mapper.select: select * from yy_consumdebt_goods where is_delete = 0 order by id desc

select *,round(price_amount/100,2) as priceAmountDouble,round(sale_amount/100,2) as saleAmountDouble, round(min_amount/100,2) as minAmountDouble,round(max_amount/100,2) as maxAmountDouble from yy_consumdebt_goods where is_delete = 0 and goods_no = #{goodsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id desc limit 1
